reviewText: Excellent research by a diligent author. The story of scientific progress in the third Reich is breathtaking. Had they started a couple of years sooner they would have been in possession of ICBMS with hydrogen warheads, scalar weapons,  advanced stealth jet powered aircraft and the list goes on. My only criticism of this presentation is the abrupt ending seemingly in the middle of a longer presentation. A must see for serious students of National  Socialist German science.
Ordered this item twice and each time it came there was nothing on it.  Tried it on several DVD players as well as the computer with the same result "Blank Disc"
